main event: Two teenagers, Judy Shaver and Nancy Morros, reported seeing a bright unidentified flying object while swimming in Bloomingburg, New York.
interesting points: The object was described as very bright and ascended swiftly before veering sharply and speeding off., The sighting occurred on a Sunday evening during the summer., The teenagers did not report the sighting immediately for fear of not being believed., The object reportedly moved too fast for the girls to track with their eyes., The girls tried to convey what they saw to others but faced skepticism.
sighted object: a big bright unidentified flying object
